analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#292-343) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#338)

Crowdsale.CAP should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#238-239)
Crowdsale.PreIcobonusEnds should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#240-245)

TOKKA.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#210-212)
TOKKA.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#204-206)
TOKKA.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f50514ff53645ea5d2ad0dfdca82bdc7ea61386.sol#209-210)
